name: Outbreak Island
storyline:
A mysterious experiment drove the population of Erlsen Island crazy. The authorities have isolated the region from the outside world and sealed «the incident».

As a detective Howard Chapman, you secretly arrive on the island to look into the cause of the accident. There is no way back. All that remains is to survive and investigate.
summary: Outbreak Island is a survival game with detective elements. Investigate the mysteries of an island and stay alive at any cost using a camera, handcrafted weapons and deduction.
